 -----------
| Matrice A |
 -----------

| Vérification de la décomposition => A = P^t * L * U |
 -----------------------------------------------------
 1,0000000000  0,0000000000  0,0000000000  1,0000000000  0,0000000000  1,0000000000 
-1,0000000000  0,0000000000  0,0000000000  2,0000000000  0,0000000000  2,0000000000

 ------
| U^-1 |
 ------
 1,0000000000  0,0000000000  0,0000000000 -0,3333333333  0,0000000000  0,0000000000 
 0,0000000000 -1,0000000000  0,3333333333  0,0000000000  0,0000000000  0,0000000000

| A^-1 => Y * X * P |
 -------------------
